detail_desc: Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a wide waist panel.
Double-layered hat in soft, fine-knit wool with a small fabric appliqué on the hem.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), short flutter sleeves and a decorative bow at the waist.
Jacket in printed imitation leather with a collar and diagonal zip down the front. Shoulder tabs with a fake metal button and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Knee-length satin wrap dress with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the front. Adjustable spaghetti straps and a seam at the waist with a flared, asymmetric skirt. Lined at the top.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an elasticated frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke, round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a raw edge around the armholes and a rounded hem.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif on the front, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Slip-on shoes in crocodile-patterned leather. Leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a deep neckline at the back.
Straight-cut tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Padded jacket designed for a small dog in woven fabric with a hook and loop fastening at the neck and a hole for a lead at the back of the neck. Hook and loop tab with a reflective detail. Fleece lining.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Large earrings in metal and plastic. Length 7 cm.
Purse with a zip around three sides. Four card compartments, one note compartment and a small, zipped coin compartment. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and frilled sleeves. Narrow elasticated seam and tie at the waist, and a gently flared skirt with a rounded hem. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short skirt with a soft, felted finish, a high waist, concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, gathered elastication at the bust and a seam at the waist. Long sleeves with gathered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.
Satin bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and tape-trimmed inner seams.

Shirt jacket in imitation leather with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke. Open chest pocket, concealed pockets in the side seams, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined. The shirt is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin. The polyurethane content of the shirt is water-based and free from DMF.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in ribbed jersey with concealed elastication at the waist. Jersey lining.
Ear decoration in metal with pearly plastic beads. Small earring at the bottom linked to an ear cuff with a ball chain.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Jumper in a fine-knit alpaca and wool blend with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and pin-tucks on the legs.
Sleeveless top in pleated jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut edge at the hem.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in lace and mesh with moulded, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Sleeveless satin top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Metal chain bracelet with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 20-25 cm.

Casual, easy pull on joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy, softly draping chiffon with pleats. Double-layered at the top with a deep V-neck, open back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and turn into long ties. Seam under the bust with narrow elastication at the back, gathered seams on the skirt for added width, and an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Fabric trainers with lacing at the front and soft heels that can be folded down so they can be worn as slip-ons. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in airy organza with a collar, covered buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a high, double-layered collar with gathered seams and decorative pleats, and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Double-layered yoke with gathers to create width, long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, cuffs with decorative pleats and covered buttons, and a straight-cut hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub jersey made from organic cotton with short sleeves and an open chest pocket.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a turtle neck, visible zip at the back, cut-out section at the sides and a covered metal ring at the front. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric lined with a detachable fleece jacket so that it can be worn as a shell jacket, a lined outdoor jacket or a separate fleece. The jacket has a lined, detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Elastication at the cuffs, a single back vent and reflective details. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Boxy-style cardigan knitted in soft wool with a V-neck, buttons down the front and two patch front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Calf-length wrapover dress in a patterned weave with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck at the front. Seam at the waist with a narrow tie belt and draped skirt. Lined.
Fabric-covered Alice bands in various designs: one glittery, one patterned and one with a sewn-on bow.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Skirt in washed stretch denim with appliqués on the front. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a drawstring and flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties. Lined.

Joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets. Relaxed fit with tapered legs that have shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.
V-neck T-shirt in airy slub linen jersey.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Fitted top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back and long sleeves.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and legs that can be rolled up with a tab and press-stud.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in felted fabric with a high, stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6//7/8 plus.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with an unlined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Sleeveless top in woven fabric that is pleated all round. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
